name: めぐる
text:
えへへ……真乃と一緒のオフ
うれしいな！
trans: Ehehe! I'm so happy spending the day-off with you, Mano!

name: 真乃
text: うん、私もめぐるちゃんが誘ってくれて、うれしいっ
trans: Yes, I'm also glad that you invited me, Meguru.

name: めぐる
text:
さーって、真乃
どこへ行こうかー？
trans:
Alright, Mano.
Where should we go?

name: 真乃
text:
めぐるちゃんは
どこか見たいお店とかある？
trans:
Meguru,
is there like a shop that you want to see?

name: めぐる
text: そうだな～、雑貨屋さんとか見たいかな
trans: Well, I guess I want to see something like a variety store.

name: 真乃
text:
雑貨屋さんなら、この先にかわいいお店があるよ
格好いいのがよかったら、あのお店とか……
trans:
There's a cute shop just ahead if you want to go to a variety store.
As for a cool one, maybe that shop...

name: めぐる
text: へぇっ、詳しいんだね！
trans: Heh, you sure know a lot!

name: 真乃
text: うん、この辺はよく来るから
trans: Well, I do come here a lot.

name: めぐる
text:
真乃って公園が好きってイメージだったけど
こういうところも来るんだ？
trans: You have this image of preferring parks but you come to these kinds of places too.

name: 真乃
text: お散歩が好きだから、あちこち見て回るの
trans: I like talking walks so I look around many different places.

name: 真乃
text: 外にいるといろんな風景が見れて、とっても楽しいんだ
trans: There are a lot of sighs to be seen outside, so it's really enjoyable.

name: 真乃
text:
例えばこんなふうにゆっくり周りを見渡すとね
……ほわっ
trans: For example, being able to take the time to look around like what we're doing right now. Oh.

name: 真乃
text: あの鳥さんがこんな都心に……
trans: To see that bird in the middle of the city...

name: めぐる
text:
真乃？
まって、どこ行くの？
trans:
Mano?
Hold on, where are you going?

name: めぐる
text:
前を見て歩かないと危ないよ
どうしたの、真乃？
trans:
It's dangerous to not look ahead while walking.
What's gotten into you, Mano?

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ、ごめん
あそこの電柱に珍しい鳥さんがいたから、つい……
trans: Oh, sorry about that. There's a rare bird over there at that telephone pole that I couldn't help myself.

name: めぐる
text:
あ、本当だ、鳥がいるね
この辺では珍しい鳥なの？
trans:
Oh, you're right, there is one.
Is it a rare bird around this area?

name: 真乃
text: うん、いつもはね、山のほうに棲んでるんだよっ
trans: Yes. You see, they usually live in the mountains.

name: めぐる
text:
へえ～！
……よかったね、珍しい子が見れて！
trans:
Heh!
Isn't that nice finding one here!

name: 真乃
text:
うんっ
あの羽のモフモフ、かわいいなぁ……
trans:
Yes.
Those fluffy wings are so cute.

name: めぐる
text: うんうん、モッフモフだよね
trans: Yes, so fluffy.

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふ、そうだよね
モフモフやわらかそうだなぁ……ほわぁ～
trans:
Fufu, right.
It looks so fluffily soft. Ah.

name: めぐる
text: ……かっわいい～！
trans: That's so cute!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ！？　ど、どうしたの、めぐるちゃんっ？
急に抱き付いて？
trans:
Ah? W-What's the matter, Meguru?
You suddenly embraced me.

name: めぐる
text: ほわほわしてて、ほんっとーにかわいいんだから！
trans: So very soft and absolutely adorable!

name: 真乃
text:
えっ……あ、あれ？
鳥さんのこと……だよね？
trans:
Eh? H-Huh?
You're talking about the bird, aren't you?

name: めぐる
text:
鳥もだけど鳥もだけど！
もうっ、かわいいなあっ！
trans:
Yes, a bird, a bird!
But, oh so cute!

name: 真乃
text:
ううっ、そんなに強くしたら……
く、くるしいよぉ～
trans: Uuh... If you embraced me so hard... I-I'll feel embarrassed.

name: めぐる
text:
真乃がかわいいから、仕方ないの！
もうちょ～っと我慢してね！
trans:
You're just so cute so there's not helping it!
Just bear with it me for a little longer!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ
かわいいって、私のことなの～？
trans:
Oh...
By cute, you're talking about me?

name: めぐる
text: 気が付くのが遅いよ～！
trans: Aren't you a little to late to realize that!
